DOC.brief_summary: In the study benefits of using mobile phone assisted remote patient monitoring including self-measurements of blood pressure, heart rate and weight as well as monitoring of personal health status are investigated in the care of heart failure patients.
DOC.brief_title: Heart at Home- a Self-care Study
